text: Helenio Herrera Gavilán (; 10 April 1910 – 9 November 1997) was an Argentine- French football player and manager. During his managerial career, Herrera won four La Liga titles in Spain (with Atlético Madrid and Barcelona) and three Serie A titles in Italy with Inter.
